participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.background: I am clumsy, I often trip over my own feet and bump into things. I went to a music festival with my family and we all had a great time. I play the bass guitar because it is a good instrument for someone who is well built and tall. I work long hours in the sun and my eyes get tired. I enjoy taking yoga classes and am always looking for new ways to improve my practice.

participant_2.name: Jessica Smith
participant_2.background: I'm a busy nurse but I love playing basketball on the weekends. I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, but I'm ready for a change. I collect cycling-related items to remember my father by. My heart is full of love for my family and friends. My appearance is important to me, because it reflects my professionalism and my dedication to my job.

content.text: I'm a clumsy person, I often trip over my own feet and bump into things. What about you?
I'm not clumsy at all, I'm quite athletic. I play basketball on the weekends. What do you do for fun?
I play the bass guitar and I enjoy taking yoga classes. I also love going to music festivals with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I used to play the bass guitar, but I haven't had time to practice in a while.
I know what you mean, I work long hours so it's hard to find time for hobbies. Do you have any other hobbies?
I collect cycling-related items to remember my father by. He was a huge cycling fan and I love to keep his memory alive.
That's such a sweet thing to do. My heart is full of love for my family and friends too.
I'm glad to hear that. My appearance is important to me, because it reflects my professionalism and my dedication to my job.
I can understand that. I always try to put my best foot forward, especially when I'm at work.
It's important to make a good impression. It sounds like we have a lot in common.
I think so too. It's nice to meet you.
